questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: If I had 1 million euros, I would certainely buy a big field to set up a little autonomous village. I would have my own farm and animals. Of course I would have to learn very much, but I would also look after qualified and interested persons to fulfil this project. We would have to build systems to make our electricity and bring drinkable water.

With the rest of the money I would fund developement projects or maybe, who knows, builld up my own association. It would be greatful if I really could do something against climate change and environment.
But if 1 million euros should change my interests, I would prefer not to have it.
